name: Find The Sprite [Demo]
description:
Hello! This Game Is Inspired By A Roblox Game: https://www.roblox.com/games/3915426994/Untitled-Door-Game

I am trying to recreate it but in a different way as you notice from the alpha you should look for things [sprites, hints etc] to continue in the game i hope you like i try to improve it as much as possible and say thank you for playing it [if you played it]
Game On Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/530992811/
[NOTE: The Game Is In Demo Not In Alpha]
